job.title: Senior Data Scientist-Supply Chain
job.description: ltpgtOne of the most recognized brands in the world is looking to hire a Senior Data Scientist to join their Advanced Analytics team focused on directtoconsumer business ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe Senior Data Scientist will collaborate with a team of data scientists and business stakeholders  to clearly communicate meaningful insights to internal audiences This person will have the ability to tell a story with dataltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspResponsibilitiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltspangtPlay a crucial role in understanding their customers through detailed analysisltspangtltligtltligtltspangtDevelop statisticaleconometric methods machine learning techniques and big data solutions to forecast consumer demand and determine optimal level of investment in various stages of the supply chainampnbspltspangtltligtltligtAssess business requirements and constraints to make tradeoff recommendations between speed and accuracy of alternative solution approachesampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspltligtltligtIdentify and apply appropriate methods to acquire explore cleanse and fuse data from different sourcesampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspltligtltligtSupport the adoption of analytic products through effective storytelling and collaboration with key partnersltligtltligtPartner with Demand and Supply Management as well as Data Science and EngineeringltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtRequiredltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt510 years of related Analytic Data Science experienceltligtltligtMS in Statistics Mathematics Economics Computer Science or related field ltligtltligtExpert live Python SQL Machine Learning and Predictive ModelingltligtltligtAbility to tell a story with dataltligtltulgt
